headline: Coinbase, Robinhood Stocks Rise. Why They Can Shake Off Regulatory Setback.
summary: Coinbase Global  and  Robinhood Markets  stocks were set to recover some lost ground Friday after plunging in the previous session and moving out of step with Bitcoin’s recent rally.  Coinbase  shares rose 1.1% in premarket trading, after slumping 6.5% Thursday and  Robinhood  climbed 1.8% after a 7.8% drop.  The sharp falls were tied to concerns over delays of the much-anticipated Digital Asset Market Clarity Act, as well as increasing dissatisfaction within the crypto industry regarding the latest draft of the bill.

headline: US Stock Market Today: S&P 500 Futures Edge Higher On Strong Jobs Data And Tariff Jitters
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Friday, Jan, 16 2026 US stock futures are pointing higher this morning, with E-mini S&P 500 contracts up about 0.3%, as investors weigh strong economic data against fresh trade tensions. Weekly initial jobless claims have dropped to 198,000, and continuing claims are at 1.884 million, numbers that signal a resilient job market and, for many households, better job security.
